entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
